sections.heading: of member; credit with regular interest
sections.text: The account of each member in the School Retirement Fund shall be credited with regular interest earned monthly, quarterly, semiannually, or annually as the retirement board may direct.SourceLaws 1945, c. 219, ยง 33, p. 649;R.S.Supp.,1947, ยง 79-2933;Laws 1949,
